Enemy head at (3,2) can reach (3,3) (apple) or move toward me slowly, but cannot reach my immediate UP cell (1,2) this turn. UP moves me directly toward the nearby apple cluster at (1,4) while keeping distance from the enemy and preserving multiple follow-up options (left/right/up). RIGHT is safe but brings me closer to the enemy; DOWN/LEFT risk cornering.

Short plan: Head toward (1,4) and grab that apple, then continue up/left/right to collect (1,8) or swing toward (2,8)/(3,3) if the enemy commits to (3,3). Avoid hugging walls and avoid head-on fights with the enemy.

Choice:
